page.title: 08Scott's Diary,Cortachy
page.content:
{ {Tuesday,7th May,1985. }
Back to school after yesterday's holiday.Granda was attacked by the cockerel.It's a wild beast.Don't think it will live very long.Was picked up by Mum's friend who took us to her house.Dad and Granda were away to see Mum in hospital.Went down the River Walk.It was a lovely day and I had to take off my jersey.All the flowers are coming out.I saw a grey wagtail at the Fish Cree.Saw one or two salmon in the river.Found a pigeon's nest in the beech tree.Walked back to the house and Dad picked us up.Went to Cubs after tea.Edzell came to play football.We were beaten 5-1. Got home about 8 p.m.Went to bed about half past.
